name: Format\Mosaic
description: The component for displaying a set of images as tiles in no particular order.

properties.name: items
properties.description: An array of the images that will appear in the mosaic. The order used in the array may affect layout and positioning in the mosaic, depending on the device or width. Gallery items can be JPEG (with .jpg or .jpeg extension), PNG, or GIF images. If the GIF is animated, the animation plays only in full screen.

properties.name: role
properties.description: This component always has a role of mosaic.
